Services.name: No Data Collecting
Services.text: We will not, in any circumstances, share your personal information with other individuals or organizations without your permission.

Services.name: Third Party Pay
Services.text: We use stripe to manage payments and send payouts.

Features.title: Post
Features.text: Post your artwork for sale or show off on your personal art gallery.

Features.title: Connect
Features.text: View and purchase all the works of your favorite artists and styles.

Features.title: Socialize
Features.text: View your friends' art galleries and current collections.

Features.title: Browse
Features.text: Customize your feed and stay up to date on your favorite artists or friend's art collections.
